column5: Has anyone ever fished Pipstone and could you provide suggestions as to what to bring for tackle. Will be going in middle jun(10-17). Any suggestions would be appreciated.Glen Bunnell

Glen,Pipestone is part of a big chain that has all species. You can go after muskies, lake trout, walleye, smallies and pike, and panfish, of course. Pipestone is deep and clear and contains lakers and muskies. Toward the other end, Lake Dispair, is darker. I think one piece of advice is bring all your stuff and fish the part of the chain that's "going" at that time.Jim
